name: Shadoweight: A Moguel tale
description:
Shadoweight: A Moguel tale

A pixel-action survival videogame jam.

Defend your friend against the creatures and try to heal him with the cures spread around the building.

Search the cures in Four different floors:

-The Office.

-The Room.

-The Church.

-The Rooftop.

Fight against The monsters:

-Suneo: The cool monster.

-Soler: The fast monster.

-Calvofuego: The tank monster.

-Delivery Guy: The guy that bring the food to your friend, don't kill it or the pizza will be wasted.

Controls:

WASD- To move.

LeftMouse- To shoot.

E/SpaceBar- To interact.

Esc- To exit.

People behind the project:

R2isAbot (Music director, screenwriter and Art supporter and awesome bot).

Davidenki (Project manager and Programmer).

@Ad0rian (Art director and level designer).
